data.title: Corporate Governance - Final
data.meta_description: corporate governance -final - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a project report submitted to Panjab University, Chandigarh by Kashika Soin to fulfill the requirements for a Bachelor of Business Administration degree. It examines corporate governance practices in the Indian IT industry. The report includes an acknowledgement, certificate of original work, declaration of originality, table of contents and introduction on the concept of corporate governance, its definitions, framework and key regulatory mechanisms in India like the Companies Act 2013 and SEBI guidelines.
